comments.body: I know a guy that had long hair and no teacher said anything about it. But I don't think anyone can demand you to chop off your hair.

I have long hairs my self and except for mentor no one cares 
At most they may ask you tie it up
Bhai school thodi hai, chalta hai ye sab
tbh PES feels like school but without the dress/hair codes
You will be assigned a personal mentor, you will have to meet with them like once a week and fill out a form about how you are currently doing and you can ask them for guidance or some shit like that
I got long curls as a guy. No teacher except one asked "are they natural?" And that's it nobody cares .
Damn.. Can u explain in detail?

What they are supposed to do i guide you and answer your questions and be the first person you talk to about any college issues idk about other mentors but the one i got, i just go and fill a form like every week thatâ€™s it and tbh i prefer this that him asking questions about how my college life is going on or something

I was in ECE and my trachers used to be pretty strict about long hair but after I went to third year nobody gave a shit anymore. I had a small bun, now my hair comes up to my shoulders and I wrote all my exams like that only
